import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import fuzzywuzzy
from fuzzywuzzy import process
import sys
np.set_printoptions(threshold=sys.maxsize)
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
pd.set_option('display.max_rows', None,'display.max_columns', None,'display.width', None,'display.max_colwidth', -1)

df['date'] = df['order_date'].dt.date
df['time'] = df['order_date'].dt.time
df["day_name"] = df["order_date"].dt.day_name()

source.213ddc73:
top_10 = df.order_books_name.explode().value_counts()[0:10]
ax = sns.barplot(x=top_10.index,y=top_10.values)
ax.set_xlabel('Book Names')
ax.set_ylabel('Sold')
ax.set_xticklabels(top_10.index, rotation='vertical', fontsize=10)
plt.show()
